recipesJson.name: butterscotch banana butt custard
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: This was like my first  recipe  i ever did and it’s bangin . you can bump up the banana up to 8% if you want or keep it the same and bump up the kings custard to 11 % if you want but it’s good as is .

reviews.text:
I’m trying LB Banana Orange cause I just got it and it’s great as a single flavor. Should be bomb!
Thanks man!
